projects.name: Gophr Marketplace App
projects.description: A cross-platform marketplace app for local stores to facilitate sales and deliveries. A convenient one-stop shop for all things local. Integrated with ExpressJS microservices. Developed for Gophr App Inc.

projects.name: Free Speech Messenger

projects.name: Android CDN
projects.description: A simple drag and drop CDN that downloads any uploaded content onto a supported android device with the app instantly.

projects.name: Invoice Manager
projects.description: An online dashboard that allows business owners to create invoices, assign invoices to clients, and manage invoices, and use analytics to track expenditures.

projects.name: In-store Kiosk
projects.description: An unattended in-store kiosk for efficient ordering of products and running transactions in a convenience store. Developed for 360Fuel.
